item.description:
SAT June 25 at 8 pm * YOUR A GOOD MAN CHARLIE BROWN with the Connecticut Theatre Group

You’re a Good Man, Charlie Brown invites the kid in all of us into the world of Charlie Brown, his dog Snoopy, and the rest of the Peanuts gang for a fast paced, lighthearted musical, guaranteed to please audiences of all ages.

This 1999 revised version of Charlie Brown won two Tony Awards and three Drama Desk Awards. Come have a happy day with the Peanuts gang!

Pre Party and Afterparty for all Connecticut Theatre Group Ticket Holders

Pre-Party Dinner and Drinks starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm

PLUS – Receive a 20% Discount on your Food and Drinks at the Pre-Party and Afterparty

Information will be emailed to all Connecticut Theatre Group Ticket holders, or call (860) 987-7888

Advance Tickets are $25

Tickets are $30 at the event

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

FREE SAFE PARKING

Pick up your ticket before the show at the pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket at the pre-party starting at 6:30pm , or at the box office after 7:45pm
